title: Oncg Appoints Pomila Jaspal As Director, Finance | Mint - Mint
content: Oncg Appoints Pomila Jaspal As Director, Finance | Mint  Mint
description: Jaspal has been working with ONCG since 1985. She has also served as director on the board of ONGC Mangalore Petrochemicals Ltd., Petronet Mangalore Hassan Bangalore, and ONGC Petro additions Ltd.
